Name: Cyberpunk Girls
About the game: Cyberpunk Girls is a brutal action shooter set in the year 2169 in the cyber metropolis Oplot. The city of the future, which has become a save heaven for thugs, hackers, and gold diggers. Win the most breathtaking battles. And remember that everything comes with a price. Meet Elsa. She topped charts for the longest time, until the recent circumstances revealed a shocking truth to her, which changed the rules of the gameâ€¦ Use this opportunity to challenge those who would like nothing else but to see you fail. Game Features: Brutal Combat: game features a combat that balances brute force and patience waiting for the right moment. Equip yourself with some deadly high-tech weapons and kill them all! Story-Driven Action: dive deep into our girls' personalities & go through the story together with them. Cyberpunk Inspired Aestetics: dive in the most hight-tech and upscale fufture you could ever imagine. Fight all your enemies and immerse in the story to fully embrace the world of Oplot city! Exceptional Soundtrack: it's dynamic. It's fun. What else could you wish for?
